casebody.data:
Anne MCDONALD, Personal Representative of the Estate of Gary McDonald, Plaintiff-Appellee/ Cross-Appellant,
v.
WEST BRANCH REGIONAL MEDICAL CENTER, Defendant-Appellant/ Cross-Appellee,
and
John Tolfree Hospital, Defendant. SC: 157704
COA: 338487 Supreme Court of Michigan. October 2, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the motion to file supplemental authority is GRANTED. The application for leave to appeal the March 29, 2018 judgment of the Court of Appeals and the application for leave to appeal as cross-appellant are considered, and they are DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
